name: Ben
dialogue: Have any of you read a book that completely changed your perspective on life?

name: Henry
dialogue: Hmm, I can't think of a specific one, but many historical texts have altered my understanding of certain events.

name: Cathy
dialogue: (laughs) You would think history books are the only ones worth reading! What about you, Alice? Any favorites?

name: Alice
dialogue: Oh, I loved "Wild" by Cheryl Strayed. It made me want to go on a long hike and find myself!

name: Ben
dialogue: That sounds fascinating, Alice. I'll have to add it to my reading list.

name: Henry
dialogue: Speaking of adventures, Alice, did you ever go on that backpacking trip last summer?

name: Alice
dialogue: Yes, I did! It was incredible. I hiked the entire Appalachian Trail from Georgia to Maine.
